product_name: REI Timber Mountain Mittens - Toddler Girls'
long_description: The waterproof and breathable REI Timber Mountain mittens help keep toddler girls' hands toasty warm and protected from all the wind, snow and water that Old Man Winter throws their way. Mini ripstop nylon shells create a barrier against the elements with windproof, waterproof and breathable inserts. Silk insulation adds warmth without bulk. Grippy polyurethane palms; soft nose/goggles wipe panels on thumbs; gauntlet wrists; adjustable wrist straps.
short_description: The waterproof and breathable REI Timber Mountain mittens help keep toddler girls' hands toasty warm and protected from all the wind, snow and water that Old Man Winter throws their way.
product_group: Infants And Toddlers Gloves And Mittens
